title: how to fix OG Pixel XL low charging voltage
content:
My OG pixel XL has a low charging voltage (around 4200 mV) and is also charging slower than usual (around 53% an hour). 

I tried charging with multiple Google charging bricks to no change. However, I was charging before using another outlet which yielded much faster charge rates and voltages. 

Could this be a outlet issue or a hardware issue?
